AT.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
AT.description: Mit 50 % neuem exklusiven Levelinhalt, Super-Turbo-Modus und einer Menge verrückter Eichhörnchen-Outfits. Renne, springe, schwinge und schlage dich mit Mr. Nibbles durch 90 wilde Level des pixelgenauen Plattformspiels. Schwinge mit Mr. Nibbles durch 90 Level mit 30 exklusiven Herausforderungen, um deine Eichhörnchen-Fertigkeiten zu testen 60 Hauptschauplätze in 4 Jahreszeiten mit 3 epischen Boss-Herausforderungen! Benutze Power-Ups wie "Harte Nuss", um durch Feinde und Wände zu brechen!

BG.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
BG.description: The press is nutty about Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo! “we’re privy to a platformer that excels in every area of gaming” Nintendo Fuse – 9.5/10 “If you pass on this one you must be nuts” Nintendo Life – 8/10 “a fantastic freshman effort” Darkain Arts – 9/10 “a polished, amusing title from start to finish.” Nintendo World Report – 8/10 “I hope Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo is the start of a trend.” Family Friendly Gaming – 88% Lead Mr. Nibbles on a 3D mission to recover his acorn stash. Use his trusty grapple rope to navigate the treacherous woodland environments and defeat pesky critters! • 90 levels of pixel perfect platforming in beautiful crisp graphics • 50% new exclusive levels, new bonuses, turbo mode and a whole bunch of zany outfits • Smash and swing through 30 exclusive challenges to test your skill at bronze, silver and gold level • 60 main stages spread over four seasons with epic bosses • Collect power-ups to supercharge your adventure

BE.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
BE.description: Avec 50% de nouveau contenu exclusif, des bonus ninja, un mode turbo hyper rapide et des costumes déjantés, vous devrez aider M. Nibbles à courir, sauter et se balancer dans 90 niveaux de plateforme. M. Nibbles usera de son grappin dans 90 niveaux dont 30 défis exclusifs pour mettre vos compétences d'écureuil au défi 60 niveaux principaux à travers 4 saisons et 3 combats épiques de boss ! Utilisez des bonus comme Invincible pour éliminer tous les ennemis et murs sur votre passage !

ES.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
ES.description: Con un 50% de contenido nuevo y exclusivo, un frenético modo Turbo y un puñado de nuevos trajes estrafalarios, debes correr, saltar, balancear y aplastar con el Sr. Nibbles a través de 90 frenéticos niveles. Agarra y balancea al Sr. Nibbles a través de 90 niveles incluyendo 30 exclusivos desafíos para demostrar tus habilidades de ardilla. 60 fases principales divididas en cuatro estaciones con tres épicos desafíos con jefes. Usa potenciadores como "Invencible" para aplastar enemigos y muros.

IT.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
IT.description: Con il 50% di contenuti tutti nuovi, bonus ninja, modalità Turbo e un'intera nuova gamma di completi, Mr Nibbles correndo, saltando, dondolando e cadendo per 90 livelli platform perfetti fino all'ultimo pixel. Muovi e fai dondolare Mr Nibbles in 90 livelli con 30 sfide esclusive per dimostrare le tue abilità da scoiattolo. 60 fasi di gioco che si sviluppano nell'arco delle 4 stagioni, con 3 epiche battaglie boss! Usa i potenziamenti come ad esempio la Noce da pelare per abbattere nemici e muri!

PT.name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
PT.description: Lead Mr. Nibbles on a 3D mission to recover his acorn stash when pesky critters steal them. He must use his trusty grapple rope to navigate the treacherous woodland environments and defeat those critters! • 90 levels of pixel perfect platforming in beautiful crisp graphics • 50% new exclusive levels, new bonuses, turbo mode and a whole bunch of zany outfits • Smash and swing through 30 exclusive challenges to test your skill at bronze, silver and gold level • 60 main stages spread over four seasons with epic bosses • Collect power-ups to supercharge your adventure
